website_summaries.verdict: If you are on a budget but have your heart set on a smart TV, this model is unbeatable. It combines exceptional quality with modern smart technology.
pros: Features smart capabilities and a budget-friendly price
Miracast WiFi connectivity is reliable, making internet streaming easy
Owners are impressed with superior picture and sound quality considering the reasonable price
cons: The instruction manual that comes with it is skimpy on details, but setup isn't too difficult without clear information

website_summaries.verdict: Small TV screen that's limited to 720p HD resolution. Great size for a bedroom or kitchen.
pros: Great price for a quality, smaller TV
Includes many cool Smart TV apps
Good image quality from a popular brand
cons: One of the smallest HDTV screens on the market
Limited to 720p HD resolution, rather than 1080p HD

customer_reviews.title: Great value and and fantastically easy to set up!
customer_reviews.text: I have never bought an easier, user friendly TV to set up and start using! I picked it up, removed from the box it was set up and working in 10 minutes...WiFi and Neflx...easy! 720 DPI looks great, wanted at least 1080 but on the 24 inch screen the picture is fab, straight on, sideways or up angle! Wish all the others were so easy! I am not an audiophile but to me the sound is great volume, clear and even from the kitchen location it is great to hear 2 rooms away. At 72 I am not the most tech savvy but this was so QUICK AND EASY!
customer_reviews.author: OneEyeQueen

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up - Excellent price
customer_reviews.text: This TV is perfect. It is just the right size for my apartment bedroom. Setup was almost too easy. Scanning for channels took the longest amount of time but that's to be expected. The picture quality is excellent. Very good TV at an excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: GreggG

customer_reviews.title: Super easy set up!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful TV. Great for the bedroom. SOOO easy to set up, even with Netflix, prime and satellite service. Love it. Thanks LG for a tv even a 65 year old woman can set up with no help.
customer_reviews.author: T. Pendley

customer_reviews.title: No USB, no Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: The item description indicates there are USB ports. Likewise in the description there is a Bluetooth logo next to the Miracast and WiDI logos indicating you can link Bluetooth capable externals to the TV. Spoiler alert: It is not Bluetooth capable. Nor does it have a USB port or 3.5mm jack to add a Bluetooth transmitter.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy if only for Netflix or Hulu
customer_reviews.text: Very time you turn the TV off it defaults to TV mode and doesn't stay on Netflix. So if no tv signal is hooked up it blares static every time you turn it on - you cannot set it to auto turn on to Netflix. And, it doesn't save screen aspect ratios when you turn it off either. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: VR

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Got this TV for my daughter. It's a perfect size for her room. The picture is very clear. I also bought the recommended wall bracket. Great combination!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Setup is a nightmare; various settings are left a ...
customer_reviews.text: Setup is a nightmare; various settings are left a mystery for you to figure out. Most importantly, however, if you are looking to use the Bluetooth that is in the manufacturer's information, don't get this one. My own attempts to connect speakers, headphones and keyboard went to naught. When, after several hours I contacted LG Product support, they informed me that the set had no Bluetooth capacity. if I could give it no stars that is what I would do
customer_reviews.author: PopPop

customer_reviews.title: Very Limited "Smart" content unless you are looking for the fireplace or aquarium channels
customer_reviews.text: Nice picture quality is about the only good thing I can say. Choice of "apps" that can be used with this "smart" TV are very poor. Instructions are virtually non-existent for downloading smart content. I only found several obscure apps on the LG store. When I called LG tech support and explained the issue, I was informed that I was doing everything correctly. Then they told me if I want other apps, like Spectrum TV (my cable provider) I should buy a Roku device to attach to the TV. Duh - I'm sending this back and just buying a "dumb" TV and a Roku; it's cheaper in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Bielli

customer_reviews.title: Not capable of adding new apps.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a smart tv. There is zero search functionality so you are stuck with the pre-loaded apps, most of which are useless or foreign to the USA. Buy something else if you plan on using the TV for anything other than Netflix.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: No YouTube TV available
customer_reviews.text: I bought this smart TV to utilize YouTube TV for live television (cutting cable/Dish). However, the installed apps do not include YouTube TV, nor can it be downloaded from the AppStore on LG TV. This necessitate using an AppleTV, Firestick or Roku HDMI add-on. Therefore, there is not a need for a smart TV since a third-party dongle must be used to get YouTube TV. I am searching the web for a workaround. If none is available, I'll have to return this for a "better" smart TV that has YouTube TV available or a simple non-smart TV (and use Roku, AppleTV, or a Firestick for the smart functions).
customer_reviews.author: GFP

customer_reviews.title: A clear picture full of color!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice smart TV by LG. I've always liked LG products. I know they're very good and this TV shows that. The colors are very sharp and clear. The sound is very good. The WiFi works very well even from my bedroom, that's very good, I'm impressed. Putting the TV together with the base wasn't that hard to do either and setting it up wasn't that hard either. Yes, I was impressed with the TV, setup and also the price was very good. I would recommend this TV to others. It is indeed a nice picture to watch.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Dunger

customer_reviews.title: The most important thing to know is that there is no head phone jack.........
customer_reviews.text: Again, there is no headphone jack plus, to make things worse there is no Bluetooth capability - disregard what the Amazon.com details page says. Amazon.com technical support and I entered into a three way conversation with LG customer support who confirmed that this model does not have Bluetooth capabilities. picture and sound quality - in my opinion, is very poor for being advertised as a smart TV. The WiFi connected quickly and I did not have any issues with connecting to Prime Video. I would have to say that this is not a very smart TV mainly because of the lack of a headphone jack and/or Bluetooth. Bottom line : NOT RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for truck TV
customer_reviews.text: Need a tv on the smaller side to put in my T680. This definatly fit the bill. These days it hard to find a quality name brand TV under 32 inches that has the features of the larger Tvs.
customer_reviews.author: Josh McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Support LIVE TV with YouTube TV app
customer_reviews.text: If you were hoping to use this Smart TV for watching live TV from an app such as YouTube TV or Playstation Vue, you will be very disappointed as I am. It does not have access to the Playstation Vue app. It has the YouTube TV app, but the version of this app that is on this TV does not allow you to watch LIVE TV like you can if use the app on your computer. I'd recommend finding another Smart TV and investigating whether it supports live TV before you cut the cable.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff D. Bonta

customer_reviews.title: No Hulu?!?!  I'm disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great TV if you only like Netflix and Amazon Prime. My favorite TV App is Hulu and this TV doesn't have it and there is no way to add it. I have many other LG smart TVs and Hulu is on everyone except this one. I'll keep it and use it, but I'm not really happy with it. I wish there would have been a notification in the item description that told what apps come standard on this TV.
customer_reviews.author: A. Baird

customer_reviews.title: An excellent value with Wi-Fi options
customer_reviews.text: This TV was a pleasant surprise. At first I was disappointed, because I use a TV antenna rather than cable, and the TV seemed to need a stronger signal than most to render local stations. But then I realized that it can access your home Wi-Fi signal, and now I watch Hulu, Netflix, and YouTube on it, and there are additional options available. The picture is crisp and colorful. Can't go too far wrong at this low price.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Lynn

customer_reviews.title: This 24” smart tv does not come with a web browser
customer_reviews.text: BE AWARE! (not beware). This 24” smart tv does not come with a web browser!!! Otherwise, arrived safe, good pic.
customer_reviews.author: pine ridge farm

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: We bought multiples of these to replace outdated TV's in the smaller rooms of our Cape Cod B&B. We chose them on the strength of positive reviews on Amazon. So far there have been no comments whatsoever from our guests about these units, which indicates to us that they are doing their job as intended. Had the opposite been true there would have been complaints and critical comments. So we're satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Cambridge Living

customer_reviews.title: NO HBO
customer_reviews.text: Completely unacceptable that a new smart tv doesn't support HBO Now. There is lots of information about this out there, even some press releases that say it is available. It isn't - no HBO in North America. Will not buy another LG - going back to the (cheaper) TCL with Roku. Only bought this one because I needed something smaller than 32".
customer_reviews.author: YourDadIsBroke

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 82. Cutting the cable cord. I have WIFI. plugged in the TV. Followed the instructions and had amazon prime and several other apps to choose from. Hooked an amazon fire stick to may not so smart tv and it is working just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Foster

customer_reviews.title: Great TV, easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Great TV , easy set up , good remote , well packed , picture is one of the finest , second LG , phoned company for info answered right away , avoid Vizio , TV 's good , but remote is nerve racking.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: Not really that smart
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is decent and over all it's a nice TV. Just don't think it qualifies as a smart TV anymore with the outdated pre loaded apps. Also doesn't include the ability to add or remove any apps. Additionally if you don't have it plugged directly into cable you get to listen to the white noise and static picture every time you turn it on and there's no way to set that not as the home screen. You will probably be investing in another streaming device like we did just a few days after purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Family shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great for a small space and screen sharing
customer_reviews.text: I've not found a single think that I dislike about this TV. The sound quality is great, the picture quality is perfect for my needs, it's very lightweight and I love the screen sharing cause I can directly stream from my phone to my TV and watch Hulu, Netflix or YouTube (which is what I primarily use it for). It also is great a receiving the local broadcasts (the second most thing I use it for).
customer_reviews.author: Lee Davis

customer_reviews.title: I just brought it in my room Omg im really in love with LG very very clear
customer_reviews.text: It was time for me to buy a new tv.. im usually a Samsung fan but my bf told me LG is in competition with Samsung try LG. I just brought it in my room Omg im really in love with LG very very clear.. im very impressed my parents are in love with the tv they wont leave my room lol..
customer_reviews.author: kels

customer_reviews.title: Great picture and sound
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with this TV. One thing that I'm let down is that there isn't only 13 apps that are usable. I got it for the internet built in. I ordered a Roku Streaming Stick to get all the features that is missing as far as Apps in this TV. It will serve me nicely in my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Donna F. McCullough

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: This "smart' tv does not support Hulu or any of the other popular apps you would assume should be available. There is no way to search for an app because the LG Content store doesn't have a. search function on this model. So even t hough LG says they offer the new Disney Plus app, you will not be able to get it on this tv. Big regrets on this purchase. Have to hook my Roku up to it to get what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Gerhardstein

customer_reviews.title: LG would not honor 1 year warranty
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this TV last Oct to use in my RV, it may have been used for 10 hours .I removed it from the RV for winter storage and put it in its box. When I took it out of the box and found it to be damaged , they said it was from impact ???? So their package box is as good as their products. I have 3 vizio TVs in my home and this is the First and Last LG Product I will ever Buy. I also bought the 4 year extended warranty from amazon through Square Trade which does not cover until the Manufacturers warranty is done. P.S. they don't deserve 1 Star
customer_reviews.author: patty bila

customer_reviews.title: It has a limited amount of programs to upload and ...
customer_reviews.text: It has a limited amount of programs to upload and TNT is in Russian and can't be translated. I had to get a Ruku and it now works how I want it to. The preprogrammed Roku wanted a monthly fee--haa--they will get you any way they can, so investigate the "smart" TV before you buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Schairer

customer_reviews.title: Nice TV for the bedroom, but the power cord is short!!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the TV is as advertised. Good picture and perfect size for the bedroom . My only real problem is that it comes with a 4 foot power cord with a huge, heavy adapter (brick) on it. I have the TV mounted nicely on the wall about 7 feet above the floor, but the power cord is so short it doesn't reach the wall outlet. So, I plan to wrap the power cord around the arm that holds the TV and extends from the wall and hide the brick up behind the TV...then run a regular extension down to the wall outlet. I have tried to find an LG compatible longer power cord but no luck.
customer_reviews.author: joe s

customer_reviews.title: Smart limited
customer_reviews.text: Smart options limited. Still had to use stick. Good t.v. for price point. Great reception. Easy set up. Unlike another flat t.v. that size I bought a few yrs back, I was able to adjust sound quality very well. I use w/stick and antenna. The display of antenna network on current program is very small, n unreadible across the room but the station number is large. Remote easy to use and has several options to do similar things. Only drawbacks on remote are it would have been nice to have those 'one raised dots' on 'o.k.' or up/down, or backlit to make it easier to use in darkened room.
customer_reviews.author: pxn

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Work with DirectTV Now
customer_reviews.text: I gave this TV 3 stars because it appeared to be a fine product. However, I had to return it immediately because it didn't allow the user to stream DirectTV Now, the main service to which I subscribe. With this being a "Smart" TV, it uses your Wi-Fi to connect to the Internet. You'd figure that would allow you to connect to whatever app or service you use. You'd be mistaken. I called LG Product Support just to be sure... They said as of yet (December 2018), they do not allow their TVs to access DirectTV Now. LG may make Smart TVs, but this business decision does not appear to be at all "Smart."
customer_reviews.author: Just Sayin'

customer_reviews.title: great little tv's, but they are a 2016 model, and I can't use the smart features without a Roku.
customer_reviews.text: I just said it all above. These are great little tv's, but they are a 2016 model, and I can't use the smart features without a Roku. I have tried to update the tv's system but it says it is up to date. It won't let me update and ad apps. But for the price, the size is perfect for my kitchen and on my patio. So Roku gets a share. I'm ok with that.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy S.

customer_reviews.title: Stinks on Ice
customer_reviews.text: It's not a smart TV. It has some extremely poor apps/games and a handful of popular apps like Netflix, Amazon, and YouTube, but smart is not a good word to describe a TV that can't add any apps. I'm not sending it back because it's a hassle. I'll buy a Firestick so I can turn this "Smart TV" into an actual Smart TV. Bite me. You guys suck.
customer_reviews.author: Big Steve from Seymour (by Gawd) Texas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect small & lightweight TV for your RV/camper project!
customer_reviews.text: Mine I purchased off Amazon Warehouse Deals and the biggest problem was there was no remote included and Amazon Customer Service took care of this for me. Perfect size and weight for my camper, and exactly what I was looking for - a small lightweight Smart TV with good picture and sound. It was miserable to try to set up without the remote though, so don't even try. A great TV used or new, I like this very much and I am usually very picky about only purchasing Sony televisions.
customer_reviews.author: GuyMc

customer_reviews.title: Borderline Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This TV is borderline nonfunctional. The software that manages the various apps (amazon, hulu, netflix, etc.) crashes several times per day and requires frequent reboots. Also, at least once per day it crashes so hard that the only way to fix it is to unplug the tv to force it to reboot because it stops responding to the remote. Even when it is working it is slow to load and sluggish to respond to commands from the remote. Do yourself a favor and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Person Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Daugther loves
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my collage aged daughter. She loves it. For her bedroom in her apartment it was the perfect size and we really liked that it was a smart TV. This is a rarity to find in this size of a TV. It was simple to set up and the ease of use is excellent. LG has us for TV's for sure as this isn't our first purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Fentress

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that the picture quality of the 720 resolution might not be acceptable, but was encouraged by an earlier reviewer who reported that it was fine given the size of the screen. Found that I was disappointed, probably because I've gotten accustomed to those sets with the higher resolution. Will keep it for use in a guest bedroom, but, I wish I had stuck with my first inclination and gone with the higher resolution. Additionally, don't count on using apps such as Netflix....I was lost trying to get it to work and gave up. I've generally been pleased with LG's products, but this was a exception.
customer_reviews.author: J Thomas Holman II

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small room
customer_reviews.text: Sent to mom and she loves it !! Perfect for room with no cable !! Has the WiFi for Netflix !! Mom is happy !!!
customer_reviews.author: Hey

customer_reviews.title: Great for the RV
customer_reviews.text: Got this TV for the RV because it is one of the few that use DC power. I did have to get the 12V to 19V adapter (pictured), but better than having to run my inverter. Excellent picture, good sound, low amp draw, and much better quality than the overpriced 12V televisions out there. The built-in screen casting works great from my Samsung tablet. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Nice tv but not truly smart
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality television with nice sound. Has great picture quality. It is not a true smart tv as described. It can access your WiFi but can only utilize preloaded apps. Be aware of what you are buying before you purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Not Wi-Fi Friendly for all Systems - No Decent Speaker/Headphone Jack
customer_reviews.text: This "smart" tv does not have a screen to access your Wi-Fi network (meaning if there is a logon/password that must be entered then you're SOL). Also, there is no speaker/headphone out with the exception of some sort of optical arrangement that I would guess requires additional equipment. Overall this "smart" tv is far more trouble than it's worth.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: So glad I chose this LG TV
customer_reviews.text: When my 1 1/2 yr old TV stopped working, I was shocked as well as devastated. Electing to stay inside as requested daily on TV to help the Virus to subside, you need home entertainment. Most stores were out of TV's or the wait time was over a week. Fortunately Amazon had stock and after reading numerous reviews I decided to order this TV. It was 'easy' to install and the color quality was much better than the Samsung I had before this one. Love it! thanks, vv
customer_reviews.author: valpal

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a Smart TV for my kitchen, and this one fits under my wall cabinets. Unfortunately, the picture is mediocre at best, and the screen tilts slightly downward. I put it on a small pedestal, which helps a bit, but it is suboptimal. All the technology seems to be going into making big screen TVs. Very few 24" and smaller TVs are available, and these do not have the same quality of picture. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Bonjour

customer_reviews.title: Not a Smart TV. Limited apps.
customer_reviews.text: You won’t find a search bar on their content store to download additional apps that aren’t sponsoring them. No disney plus. No sling. Tv doesn’t have a regular play store or anything like that. It’s “LG content store” and it’s extremely limited. Crackle? Netflix? Who uses those anymore? Only useful thing on this tv was YouTube but you won’t get a true smart tv with this model. I hate sending things back after being misled.
customer_reviews.author: A. A

customer_reviews.title: Great picture; hard to read selections
customer_reviews.text: The picture on this unit is really sharp and impressive. The downside for me is that text on the screen for selections on any of the apps or reading the summary of a program was too small to easily read for how I was using it. I opted to go for a larger size TV, which is the only reason not 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler742

customer_reviews.title: NO YOUTUBE TV
customer_reviews.text: As a TV, it is fine. However, I expected to have the ability to get the Youtube TV app as I have on my other LG sets. Youtube said any LG 2016+ is fine, this is a 2016 TV so.. why no app? As the main reason I wanted this set was to be able to put it on the porch to watch a ball game off of Youtube TV, its pretty much worthless to me.
customer_reviews.author: Trust No One

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great price , perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Nice TV, Nice Picture, Just the right size for my kitchen. Great Price, Great quality. I am very happy with this TV. Cons: Thought it had blue tooth tech, so I was hoping to be able to connect to my head set or blue tooth speaker. but does not so not have blue tooth on board so not a big sound. I can always hook up a n external speaker. But I got it for being able to watch it while I am working in the kitchen so I dont need really need a big sound.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer D Leffel

customer_reviews.title: Decent TV but no Bluetooth or 3.5mm jack
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV because it lists that it has Bluetooth, but it in fact does not. Doesn't even have a 3.5 mm jack for me to use older headphones with. Should have read the reviews. Be more informed than I was.
customer_reviews.author: Danny J.

customer_reviews.title: Love this tv.
customer_reviews.text: We love this tv. The picture is great. We have it in our den and it's our only tv so it gets a lot of use. There is nothing that I dislike about it. Some folks have a problem with the sound but we find the sound quite satisfactory. Now look people you are not going to get the same sound from a 24" tv that you're going to get from a larger tv. However, for a relatively compact space this tv is terrific. And, you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No real durability
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV about 9 months ago, to replace one that lasted over 10 years, and within a couple of months it started going "solaried": the whole screen goes pink-magenta-green. I turn the device off and back on, and this goes away, but returns randomly. Going to return it, as it's under warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Alok Jolly

customer_reviews.title: Very dull. Had to buy a converter to enable use ...
customer_reviews.text: Picture didn’t seem he at all. Very dull. Had to buy a converter to enable use of headphones, then no volume control for them. Just didn’t suit my needs. Replaced it with a $98 Element from Walmart. Much better for my needs, good picture too.
customer_reviews.author: Glen J

customer_reviews.title: Perfect light weight smart tv ever fits great in rv ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect light weight smart tv ever fits great in rv and love that it’s got a lot of bells and whistles. Picture quality is unbelievable in this size tv extremely satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in Oct. of 2018. I used it fo r8 months. Although it says it is connected to internet none of the apps will open. I tried resetting to factory settings. still nothing. When I attempted to connect to amazon prime.,After 7 attempts it finally connected. Now it won't at all. If 0 was possible I would give it that. I have never had a t.v. last less than a year
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TV
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a small office. hooked it up to an antenna. Great reception and color The smart portion of it works great on the antenna. Able to connect to my wifi to use Netflix and amazon prime. took a little time to connect, but once yur in its very good.
customer_reviews.author: kardella

customer_reviews.title: Great set. Lacking HBO/Starz/Showtime support??
customer_reviews.text: Lovely little set that we added to the kitchen. Absolutely perfect for that use. However, despite all the nice streaming app support, STARZ, Showtime and HBO are all glaring ommissions. We can use our Chromecast to stream these apps, but that’s just an extra layer to fiddle with, and since the HDMI ports are rear-face mounted, the Chromecast sticks straight out of the back of the TV, no longer letting us set it flush against the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Winston C. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Good TV but....
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this TV for my basement office. My router is on the 2nd floor of my home so the TV would not connect properly or function correctly. I was ready to send it back. I was using a Fire stick in the basement on another TV. The Fire stick must have a better Wifi receiver as that did the trick. Other than that, very good TV but I need the stick.
customer_reviews.author: Islanders Man

customer_reviews.title: Useless, no Hulu and limited apps otherwise
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t have the option the download Hulu which is almost entirely what my dad wants it for. Other apps also limited - a very small selection of seemingly ‘off-brand’ apps in the LG Content store. My father is bedridden for the next few days so now I have no choice, he’s got basically YouTube and nothing else. Should have just given him my laptop to use.
customer_reviews.author: Gorgiamos

customer_reviews.title: Solid TV set....... some false advertising though!
customer_reviews.text: Solid TV set. To be honest the biggest issue I have with it relates to a bit of false advertising either on Amazon’s side or LG’s. The product information indicates that this product has Bluetooth connectivity. It does not as far as I am aware. I think Amazon should take responsibility for correcting this as it misleads customers. Other than that picture quality, sound, smart features are good for a tv of this size.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bushell

customer_reviews.title: LG makes the best TV's.
customer_reviews.text: LG is a wonderful TV (I have 2) and bought this for my husband to watch in bed. Easy t use and program, the apps are all right there,.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mordue

customer_reviews.title: A Great Television
customer_reviews.text: This television is beautiful. It came very nicely packaged, no dents, clean, and best of all, in a pristine condition. A great television, at a great price, just right for a small space. The sound is good, though it lacks some bass. But I am very pleased, as I hope others who buy it will be too.
customer_reviews.author: CLEONBROTUS

customer_reviews.title: LG TV
customer_reviews.text: Put this tv in my kitchen, I like the product as I have LG televisions throughout my house so the similarities are nice. Wish the sound was a bit louder on it as I tend to have the volume maxed out in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan W

customer_reviews.title: Contrary to description, you can not load Hulu on this
customer_reviews.text: Probably ok, overall. However, contrary to the product description, it does NOT support Hulu (which is what I bought it for) and it is not offered in the downloads. Do not buy if you want this for Hulu.
customer_reviews.author: TNTom

customer_reviews.title: Nice picture.
customer_reviews.text: We have a 55" lg that we have been happy with, so when choosing a small set for the kitchen, we were biased towards LG. Only complaint is the speakers are adequate. We ended up purchasing a LG sounder for the large set and purchased a Yamaha sound bar for this one. We use it more for music than anything else, so I have no idea how the sound is.
customer_reviews.author: B. McKay

customer_reviews.title: No webOS as advertised in spec sheet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this TV to access Hulu without the need for an external device such as a firestick. Under Amazon's product information --> specification sheet, the TV is designated a webOS TV which would allow one to access the internet and download APPS. IT IS NOT WEB ACCESSIBLE like Amazon Prime or Netflix. Amazon needs to correct the spec sheet .
customer_reviews.author: SueW

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive smart tv (wifi or ethernet) you can watch cable or ...
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive smart tv (wifi or ethernet) you can watch cable or Hulu, Amazon or Netflix with ease. They also offer other choices from LG store (they don't charge you, but the companies that offer those channels may or may not) for more choices if you have internet. I have 3 monitors on my desk and it is slim.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba Miller

customer_reviews.title: I recieved a defective tv
customer_reviews.text: This tv likes to exit out of whatever I'm watching to go back to the blank home screen. This was going to be used for my sons room but with it not being able to stay on it will become the closet tv that doesn't get used. Whenever I try to play a YouTube video the screen just goes black, you have to hit the home button and go back into it multiple times before it decides to work, of it does. Most of the time it wont and I have to pick a different video
customer_reviews.author: andrew shirkey

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT, still using it every day in our kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! Great picture fair sound. Gets used all day in our kitchen. I also absolutely love the half volume feature to cut down on commercials or while you are on the phone, look for it on every TV we buy now. Fits perfectly under the kitchen cabinets glad we bought it and for only $124. Michael
customer_reviews.author: mjp28

customer_reviews.title: With xfinity/comcast, this LG would not work with the Samsung 24 TV we bought 2 years ago
customer_reviews.text: We moved from Maryland to Rehoboth Beach Delaware on September 30th, 2017. I retired in 2018 and you still used my Virginia work phone - 703 906 6630. It should have been 302 567 5925. Also, we paid over $2200.00 for this piece of worthless junk. Why are you only returning less than $145.00. Does Mr. Bazos need extra money?
customer_reviews.author: Robert Webb

customer_reviews.title: LG Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing to say about this TV that isn't stellar. I love it, bought the wall mount that swivels with it and now can watch it from my kitchen table or swing it around so I can see it while working at the counter or sink. I love it, it is there perfect size, it is an excellent TV.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy A. Graham

customer_reviews.title: You wanted a great little TV, this is it
customer_reviews.text: This unit will be going in my small RV. It fits nicely on the shelf. It was easy to set up and scan my OTA stations. I don't use cable TV so that feature wasn't tested. This TV has plenty of inputs and outputs for its size and price range. The sound was exactly what I expected for an enclosure this size. Much better volume and picture than my old TV. The share on-screen option is a nice add on. Look, you want a tv for the kitchen, RV, kids room, this will work fine. Oh, and I'm pretty sure I can run this on 12 DC which makes it a dual-sourced appliance.
customer_reviews.author: James Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Nice enough
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect size for my bedroom. But does not support Hulu and no way to dowload on. Does have netflix, and amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia B. Geiger

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, lots of connections, you can’t go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Very please with the 1080 P resolution on such a small screen , what is unexpected. Has no controls other than the joystick in the center of the bottom outer frame of the TV. Takes a bit of getting used to, but now I like it. Has all the audio video connection you would want which is unusual for a small screen TV. If you don’t have the space for a larger screen TV this definitely will fit the bill , And you certainly can’t complain about the price
customer_reviews.author: Buddy G

customer_reviews.title: There just isnt a better value
customer_reviews.text: Everything was perfect. This is the best packaging in the industry. It has everything for mounting on any kind of bracket. The sound is brilliant. I use it in the kitchen. If you have an application for this size TV or monitor, stop looking. Setting this up with a Fire Stick takes less than a minute.
customer_reviews.author: Robert N. Mckay

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Tried a different brand tv with similar features, but the sound quality was similar to monaural in old black and white tube systems. The LG has decent sound, with a better frequency range to my ears
customer_reviews.author: Scott Brookes

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tv thinking that it had the major apps for streaming as advertised like hulu, netflix, Amazon. It doesn't have Hulu and there is now web browser feature so the only way to stream Hulu is via firestick or roku, which is stupid bc this is a smart tv... not 100% happy but the sound and picture quality is great
customer_reviews.author: Maricris

customer_reviews.title: Last Generation Smart
customer_reviews.text: I have lived with this very limited performance for a while. I thought I was not "smart" enough to access the functions. Well, after getting my very savvy adult daughter to tech support my problems, I discovered that the TV is outdated and would not support my most used streaming sites. Don't buy this if you want to stream HULU! Also TV cast does not work. In addition, the network connection drops frequently and does not save password. So I have spent countless times reconnecting in the midst of show or movie. I will neeed to buy a newer model. Lesson learned. Money wasted:(
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt Support all APPs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV because it was a Smart TV apparently NOT smart enough. I tried to download PLUTO TV which has 100 Channels that are free and I love it. Well tried to download the App and its not supported. Call LG agent was honest and said I would just return it if you need to have that APP.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas J.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't keep the guide up to date
customer_reviews.text: Nice TV, good sound and picture, however, it doesn't keep the guide up to date, and using the guide, as some other tv's, it won't change to the selected channel, let alone show what's on that channel. Kind of hard to set it up too, but works well with my Roku.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Price

customer_reviews.title: TV is very nice for 24 inches. I ordered a 32 inch .
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 4 start because I filtered Amazon for a 32 inch tv for the nursing home for my husband. It did not say 24 inches anywhere until I got it delivered. So he’s stuck with it. The picture nice but for the price it should be 32 inches. We have a 70 inch at home. So having to go to a 24 inch stinks.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Sound level very low
customer_reviews.text: The sound from the TV was not loud enough to hear more than a few feet away and there is no audio output to add an amplifier or other assist. It didn't work for my application so I returned it. Otherwise it would have been a great TV.
customer_reviews.author: Gary M. Scoggin

customer_reviews.title: Does not support YouTube TV or Hulu
customer_reviews.text: First bad review I’ve ever given LG. I specifically purchased this model to support YouTube TV and Hulu, since I just dumped cable. It doesn’t. This is a 2018 model, and all LG after 2016 are supposed to support these apps. I spoke with LG’s customer service, and they said that since it does not have WebOS, it will not support those apps. So it’s going back, and I’m buying something else.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Cejer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality TV
customer_reviews.text: We needed a tv with a center post to fit on a nightstand. So many are made now with legs on the ends. The main reason we purchased this unit was because of the center post but we've been very happy with the video quality and performance of this tv as well. We're very satisfied with our purchase
customer_reviews.author: LJR714

customer_reviews.title: One star off for the sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my son's room. So far he says he loves it but the sound is lacking. He can still hear it, it's just not that great. He turns on the captions so as not to miss anything. But he is wanting to buy better speakers for it.
customer_reviews.author: mayday

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: It won’t hook up to Netflix or Amazon Prime, it does hook up to YouTube, 2 weeks old and have had to talk to customer service which didn’t help. Won’t buy again, we live in Alaska , very rural mail varies with weather, not happy
customer_reviews.author: Carol F.

customer_reviews.title: Issue downloading Netflix and Prime video
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2, the first had no luck downloading Netflix and Prime video. The second was the same. All other eligible apps did download with no problems... perhaps both came from the same bad batch. Will try another brand
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Truly Disappointing Connectivity
customer_reviews.text: When your TV can't pick up your wifi on a 200 dollar router, then the TV antenna is terrible. It actually is the worst connection I've had on any electronic device since the invention of WiFi. I kept thinking it'd get better, no. Poor poor connectivity regardless of wifi signal strength and having fantastic cable service not being throttled. I wish I would of returned this POS.
customer_reviews.author: STEPHEN J BURDICK

customer_reviews.title: Terrible sound.
customer_reviews.text: Audio is garbage. It's three feet away from my face, above my treadmill and I could barely hear music with the volume turned up all the way (I'm talking 100/100). You can't connect to Bluetooth, and it only has an optical cable output which means it's basically useless unless you buy special optical speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For a smart TV this is not very SMART
customer_reviews.text: This TV does not have YouTube TV or Disney. I searched all over for those apps, wasting a lot of my valuable time, only to finally get ahold of LG customer service and be told the small LG TV's do not have those apps!! To be able to get YouTube TV is the whole reason I purchased these TV's in the first place. I returned them, but still don't have a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Great Bargain

customer_reviews.title: Good Small TV
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a secondary TV in extra room. Beautiful picture and works very well. Have not as yet used the "Smart" features - just wanted a replacement for an old TV. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Marilynn J. Holman

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: LG items speak for themselves! Great service & product! Here it is August and I was finally able to remove the TV from the box. I set it up for Firestick and antenna both work great! Excellent buy for the money! I’ll register warranty now.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Obsolete
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this TV knowing it was a couple of model years old based on the fact that it was an LG. However, the tv was really mot a smartTV and the picture quality was out of date. I do not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Bret barnard

customer_reviews.title: low quality build
customer_reviews.text: Died after 6 months of being mounted in a camper. Tv turns on then restarts over and over. Most expensive of the TVs in my camper (TCL in living, old Vizio in bunkhouse and LG in master) LG was the only tv bought specifically for the camper and was brand new.
customer_reviews.author: E. Paynter

customer_reviews.title: It's ok but.....
customer_reviews.text: I like the tv but with Direct TV, I have to use both the LG and Direct TV remotes to turn on the TV, only the LG remote can adjust volume or mute sound. I'd prefer to just use one remote to do everything.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Balanda

customer_reviews.title: Do not shop here!
customer_reviews.text: 1. Poorly packaged 2. Clearly a return from someone else 3. Tv was defective (cut itself off and on every fifteen seconds. 4. I had to pay for return even though the product was defective.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie Worley

customer_reviews.title: Randomly shuts off and won’t get a clear signal
customer_reviews.text: It seems I got two of these for my kids and one keeps turning itself off randomly and it isn’t keeping a signal used as a smart tv. Maybe need to return it we have had it for under 6months. Maybe this one is defective... the other one doesn’t seem to have these problems.
customer_reviews.author: Graffiti Bengals and Photography

customer_reviews.title: Smart view connects with smartphones without a router
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up. I wanted a tv that would connect to my smartphone without a router. Using smart view it set up right away. I have to turn the tv off to after cutting off smart view to switch back to tv or hdmi, but that's no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: gregory shane taylor

customer_reviews.title: great TV but no hbo
customer_reviews.text: Upgate: beware this TV does not support hbo go. Can't download the app so have to watch thru the horrible amazon app. - 1 star because of it. cmon its a $120 tv. its perfect and fast. can switch between apps with ease. control works perfect and it feels well made.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Try another brand
customer_reviews.text: The picture on this isn't bad when the unit comes on. You have to spend a few minutes pushing the power button for it to stay powered up. The remote is cheap feeling and the buttons often don't respond. I can't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: TX-Jeeper

customer_reviews.title: Not fully smart
customer_reviews.text: This TV is only half smart. On page 7 of the owner's manual, it says: "This Smart TV is for VOD (Video On Demand) service; some smart functions may not be supported, including a web browser." I was able to connect to WiFi but was not able to download an app. I wanted to get rid of my DTA (for which I must pay Spectrum monthly) after downloading the Spectrum TV app. It's not possible. I decided to keep the TV after all and get the Spectrum app with a Roku. It is apparently not possible to obtain a fully smart TV that is 24" or smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Louisa Filomarino Cauvin

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Fine for Netflix/Hulu/Amazon Prime. Some folks complain about the static when it's turned on with no antenna connected. I ran an auto channel scan with no antenna and now turns on quiet. Problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: John L.

product_meta.title: LG Electronics 24LH4830-PU 24-Inch Smart LED TV
product_meta.description:
Style:SingleThe right Smart TV for your bedroom, den or small apartment matters. Enjoy brilliant picture and smart audio with Miracast & WiDi connectivity, when and where you want, better than ever. LG Smart TV offers intuitive control, versatile connectivity and a world of premium content from online partners, including Netflix, YouTube, and more. Connections LG Smart TVs include built-in Wi-Fi, allowing simpler access to limitless online content. Stream all of your favorite content wirelessly via Bluetooth and Miracast. ENERGY STAR® QUALIFIED Earning the ENERGY STAR® means a product meets strict energy efficiency guidelines set by the US Environmental Protection Agency and the Department of Energy. ENERGY STAR® certified televisions are on average, over 25 percent more energy efficient than conventional models, saving energy in all usage modes: sleep, idle and on. Manufacturer: LG Electronics. Screen Size: 24". Backlight Technology: LED. Horizontal Viewing Angle: 178°. Vertical Viewing Angle: 178°. Aspect Ratio: 16:9. Features: Film Mode. Progressive Scan. Sleep Timer. Game Mode. Media Player. Closed Caption. Wall Mountable. Auto Volume Control. Auto-off. Bluetooth. Eye-Care. Screen Mirroring. Sport Mode. Smart Energy Saving. On/Off Timer. Video Signal Standard: HDTV. Scan Format: 720p. [Audio] RMS Output Power: 10 W. Sound System: Virtual Surround.

AMAZON.COM
feature_bullets: 24 Inch Simple Smart LED HD TV
TV with Stand (WxHxD) 21.9" x 5.8" x 15.2" TV without Stand (WxHxD) 21.9" x 2.1" x 13.6"
TV with Stand weight: 7.5 lbs TV without Stand weight : 7.1 lbs
